story:
The Story of Lost in the Stream

 

My Book Journey

My name is Johnny Savage, and I am the author of Lost in the Stream. I wrote this book to bring others hope. For many years I was afraid to share the most important details of what happened on April 13th, 1998. It was extremely painful to share the story of being lost at sea with no hope to be saved. This event changed the sportfishing industry around the world by showing large custom yachts can sink within minutes. The event helped crews to realize the importance of having life-safety gear ready and available.

I was often told, “Johnny, you have to write a book this.”

During the summer of 2012, I was faced with the ultimate fear of losing my family. While in the middle of a severe depression that took all the value out of life, I fell to my knees and cried out to the Lord. It was like I was lost at sea once again. I needed to know that I was not alone. Then, I received a clear direction from the Lord in that prayer.

“It’s time to tell My story.”

I replied, “Lord, I’m not into glorifying myself.”

His response was, “You aren’t glorifying you. You are glorifying Me.”

In Lost in the Stream, I will bring you into the water with the crew of the Anhinga as we fought to survive in the sea ninety miles off the coast of Key West, Florida. The Anhinga sank so quickly, there was not enough time to sound a distress call or get the life-raft, emergency beacon, or life jackets. No one knew the Anhinga was taken by the overwhelming power of the sea. We were alone. Microscopic in comparison to the vastness of the open water, with no land or other vessels in sight. The crew did not know of the miraculous rescue that would occur in the middle of a storm while adrift in the Gulf Stream.


My hope is that in reading this book you will have the faith and endurance to persevere the storms or struggles that may come into your life. One of the greatest challenges in writing this book was to define the audience. Initially, I thought the audience would be outdoor enthusiasts. I was wrong; everyone will love this book. Everyone needs hope.

Ultimately, I hope that Lost in the Stream inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
  • What are the thoughts that go through the mind knowing you are going to die by drowning or being eaten alive by sharks?
  • How strong is the will to survive?
  • Do miracles really happen and is God real?

I’m not a preacher — I am just a fisherman that did not deserve to be saved. But I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with you. Through questions, I have been given closure to the pain and seen how this story has been used to give hope. I believe discussing these themes and exploring these questions will change us all for the better.
 

The Impact

I am continuously humbled by the impact the story of the Anhinga has on an audience. In this book I share some of the amazing stories of lives changed as a result of various speaking engagements. In writing this book, I have spent a great deal of time reflecting on various elements of the story where audiences have provided positive feedback on how it’s touched their lives. The main purpose of this book is to help others. In 1998, the response to what happened to the crew of the Anhinga was unanimously: "God saved those boys out there."

There were several options available for publishing this book. I learned that in typical publishing, the publisher owns the rights to the book and can change whatever they desire in order to sell more books. God truly did save Captain Eric and I out there. I absolutely do not want to give a publisher the ability to remove God from the story. That is why I have selected a hybrid publishing option with crowdfunding for this book.

Some of you already know this story and have experienced the tears and joy. Please help me to bring this story to a world that is in need of hope.


About the Author-Capt. Johnny Savage


Johnny Savage lives in the rural southern area of Virginia Beach with his wife Samantha. They have a son and three daughters who are 4th generation members of Blackwater Baptist Church. Johnny started his fishing career in 1989 working on the head boats out of Rudee Inlet (Virginia Beach, VA) until 1992 when he started working on offshore sportfishing charter boats. While attending ODU (Old Dominion University) he charter fished out of Rudee Inlet and Oregon Inlet (Outer Banks, NC) until completing his Bachelor of Science in Environmental Health and Safety in Dec. of 1996.

After his graduation, Johnny was blessed to serve in the ranks of some of the best sportfishing crews in the world fishing out of Palm Beach, FL. He would go on to fish the east coast of the US, the Bahamas, Mexico, and Bermuda.

Following an accident in 1998, John returned to ODU and charter fishing in the Mid-Atlantic area. In 2001, he obtained his captain’s license from the Chesapeake Marine Training Institute in Hayes, VA. In the same year, Johnny decided to step away from the career that almost killed him and became a safety engineer for the Ford Motor Company. He continued fishing as a freelance captain or mate.

Captain Johnny returned to fishing when Ford’s Norfolk Assembly Plant closed in 2007. His new position was a dream job with the ability to fish and save lives. He was captain of one of the first sixty-foot Viking Yachts- Episode and Safety Director for the boat owner’s company- Asphalt Roads and Materials.

In 2016, Asphalt Roads and Materials was sold to become Virginia Paving Co. where he remains in his safety position. His manager at Virginia Paving Co. realized the power of Johnny’s lost at sea story and included the writing of Lost in the Stream into Johnny’s official professional development plan. Each summer he has also had the opportunity to the operate sportfishing boats such as Just One More, Contango, and Desperado.

In 2012, the Virginia Beach Billfish Club asked Johnny to come and speak on tactics for marlin fishing. At the end of this speech, one of his former boat-owners asked that he share his story of being lost at sea so he did. It touched hearts. Then Johnny received a call from a friend asking for the story to be shared with other groups. Since then, lives have been saved, changed, and touched by power of the testimony of the Anhinga.

 

What We Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.

The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).

You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

 

Campaign Goals

(You have options on how best you want to excite your backers, and one of those ways is through what we call the Community Tier Perks. This is where you can choose to offer something that everyone who pre-orders will get in addition to the ebook and/or softcover. Below, there are the Standard Tiers many authors shoot for, and below that, are things more geared toward the community)


Standard Tiers:
Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Please email me at samantha.savage45@yahoo.com@gmail.com to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please pray for the book to have an amazing outreach!

Help get the word out and share this video. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NEX11kJmt5A

Instragram - johnny.savage_author / @newdegreepress

www.linkedin.com/in/johnasavage3

Facebook - AuthorJohnnySavage/ @NewDegreePress


With faith, hope, and love
Capt. Johnny Savage

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is William Matson. I am the writer of the acclaimed book "Crazy Horse: The Lakota Warrior's Life and Legacy" which was written with Crazy Horse family members Floyd Clown, Doug War Eagle, and Don Red Thunder based on their family's oral history. I also have written a personal book about my journey to find them and meet them entitled "In My Father's Footsteps". I am also an award winning documentary film maker. Floyd, Doug, and Don are Lakota grandsons to Old Man Crazy Horse or Waglula and are recipients of their family's oral history as passed down from the time of Crazy Horse.
  • We have been very fortunate that so many people from all walks of life have expressed their appreciation after reading our book "Crazy Horse the Lakota Warrior's Life and Legacy". While out on our book tour, the Crazy Horse family and I have had many requests for an Audiobook for those who lack the time, patience, or ability to read or have a vision impairment. Floyd, Doug, and Don will add some of our sacred Lakota songs to this Audiobook experience, while our Author, William Matson will add some sound effects to his reading to help bring the text to life. 
  • This is a unique opportunity to help the family and author make a quality recording of the family's oral history. It is also an opportunity to help the family pass it down to their more distant family members living in remote areas of the United States, foreign countries, or those still residing on the reservation. It is an opportunity to breathe life into our written words.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • In order to create a high quality Audiobook, we will need to record it in a studio setting. We estimate the time needed to record will be about 30 hours for 28 chapters and the Forward. Plus the finished recordings will need to be mastered which we estimate to take about 15 hours. We have located a studio where they will allow us to record during off peak hours at $30 per hour for a total of $1350. We will be adding some sound effects. Some sound effects we already own. Some we do not. So we expect our budget for sound effects to be modest at $300. Thus the total would be $1650. This will produce a digital Audiobook.
  • For the Crazy Horse family members we plan to make 50 hard copies to be distributed to family members which would include about 10-12 CDs, a case, artwork for the outside of the case, and individual plastic sleeves for each CD within the case to keep them from being scratched. The cost of each CD for a run of 50 and labeled to indicate what chapters are contained is $1.92 or $96 for 50 hard copies. When multiplied out to the 10-12 CDs needed that comes to $960 to $1152 total for the CDs alone. Each case costs $3.45 and contains a ring binder for CD sleeves. the cost for 50 cases would be $172.50. The sleeves cost fifteen cents each. At an estimated 10-12 CDs means the cost would be $1.50-$1.80 per case and for 50 cases would be $75-$90. Artwork on the outside cover runs about $800-1000. So the total for the 50 copies would be between $2007.50 to $2414. 
  • The grand total for both the digital copy plus the family copies is $4064. There is a 4.5% state sales tax and a 2% city sales tax for a grand total of 6.5% sales tax or $264. So to complete all we need to complete it will cost $4330. On the $4330, Indiegogo takes a 5% commission plus 5% for collecting the funds to total 10% that we will never see. So we will need to raise $4765. We have rounded it off to $4765 to make it an easy number to remember. 
  • We are offering not only the digital Audiobook, but our autographed books, our videos, and your name mentioned at the end of the Audiobook. And for three lucky individuals, your name or the name of someone you care about mentioned prior to the Audiobook reading. 

  • If for some reason we fail to raise the full $4765, our first priority will be to finish the digital copy of the Audiobook as best we can. The recording studio would be first priority with mastering the second priority. If we are fortunate enough to raise more than $1650 we will be able to distribute the book to a limited amount of our family members until we have raised the full amount and then we will be able to distribute all 50.

The Impact

  • During the late 1800s and the first half of the 1900s a great number of Native American youth were removed from their homes and sent to boarding schools to far away for their parents to visit. Since nearly all their history was oral, these young people lost the opportunity to learn their people's history from. those that lived it. So some stories are lost forever. Stories that dated back to when the descendants of the European settlers still though the world was flat. To reconnect with the North American continent's history teaches us all how things were. And if we don't where we have been then how can we possibly know where we are going in the future. "Crazy Horse the Lakota Warrior's Life and Legacy" is the oral family history of the Crazy Horse family. Right now it is in book form. However the spoken form includes the emotion with which it was told. The songs that help them tell it. A chance to feel their history through your ears, just as the children that somehow escaped boarding school heard it and why it is still alive today. To preserve this history in spoken form is to future generations, both born and still unborn. 
  • To date we have published the book "Crazy Horse the Lakota Warrior's Life and Legacy" and made a four part documentary series on our oral history. Both for the most part have been positively received. We have done a book tour where we stopped in 317 different places to speak, eleven of those in Europe via our good friend Arne Martin Boe. We intend to make this audiobook with the same dedication and quality that we gave to our previous endeavors.
  • We were not always sure how our oral history would be received because nearly all that had been told previously had been told by people from other nations other than our nation. And other families other than ours. So thus far we are humbled by the positive response we have received on our printed book and wish to dedicate this oral history as it was meant to be told, orally, to those who have opened their ears and hearts. Thank you for your support. Our hearts burst with gratitude.

Risks & Challenges

  • For over twenty years we have stayed focused on telling our story not only to our children but to the world. That focus will not waiver in completing this audiobook.
  • We are become older by the day. So we will make sure that we find a quality recording studio to make sure our audio is of the highest quality and the words are clear. Nobody knows when our Creator will take us to the other side, so the sooner we can get it recorded and available, the better. Perseverance has been the hallmark of our efforts to preserve our oral history.  Wopila!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You not only help by allocating funds for our finished audiobook or some other perk listed under "Perks", but you can also share this site with your friends on Facebook and tell your friends that aren't.
  • Indiegogo also has a few tools you can use if you are intent on sharing! Wopila!

Short Summary


My name is William Matson. I am the writer of the acclaimed book "Crazy Horse: The Lakota Warrior's Life and Legacy" which was written with Crazy Horse family members Floyd Clown, Doug War Eagle, and Don Red Thunder based on their family's oral history. I also have written a personal book about my journey to find them and meet them entitled "In My Father's Footsteps". I am also an award winning documentary film maker. Floyd, Doug, and Don are Lakota grandsons to Old Man Crazy Horse or Waglula and are recipients of their family's oral history as passed down from the time of Crazy Horse.

We have been very fortunate that so many people from all walks of life have expressed their appreciation after reading our book "Crazy Horse the Lakota Warrior's Life and Legacy". While out on our book tour, the Crazy Horse family and I have had many requests for an Audiobook for those who lack the time, patience, or ability to read or have a vision impairment. Floyd, Doug, and Don will add some of our sacred Lakota songs to this Audiobook experience, while our Author, William Matson will add some sound effects to his reading to help bring the text to life. 
This is a unique opportunity to help the family and author make a quality recording of the family's oral history. It is also an opportunity to help the family pass it down to their more distant family members living in remote areas of the United States, foreign countries, or those still residing on the reservation. It is an opportunity to breathe life into our written words.

 

What We Need & What You Get
 


In order to create a high quality Audiobook, we will need to record it in a studio setting. We estimate the time needed to record will be about 30 hours for 28 chapters and the Forward. Plus the finished recordings will need to be mastered which we estimate to take about 15 hours. We have located a studio where they will allow us to record during off peak hours at $30 per hour for a total of $1350. We will be adding some sound effects. Some sound effects we already own. Some we do not. So we expect our budget for sound effects to be modest at $300. Thus the total would be $1650. This will produce a digital Audiobook.

For the Crazy Horse family members we plan to make 50 hard copies to be distributed to family members which would include about 10-12 CDs, a case, artwork for the outside of the case, and individual plastic sleeves for each CD within the case to keep them from being scratched. The cost of each CD for a run of 50 and labeled to indicate what chapters are contained is $1.92 or $96 for 50 hard copies. When multiplied out to the 10-12 CDs needed that comes to $960 to $1152 total for the CDs alone. Each case costs $3.45 and contains a ring binder for CD sleeves. the cost for 50 cases would be $172.50. The sleeves cost fifteen cents each. At an estimated 10-12 CDs means the cost would be $1.50-$1.80 per case and for 50 cases would be $75-$90. Artwork on the outside cover runs about $800-1000. So the total for the 50 copies would be between $2007.50 to $2414. 
The grand total for both the digital copy plus the family copies is $4064. There is a 4.5% state sales tax and a 2% city sales tax for a grand total of 6.5% sales tax or $264. So to complete all we need to complete it will cost $4330. On the $4330, Indiegogo takes a 5% commission plus 5% for collecting the funds to total 10% that we will never see. So we will need to raise $4765. We have rounded it off to $4765 to make it an easy number to remember. 
We are offering not only the digital Audiobook, but our autographed books, our videos, and your name mentioned at the end of the Audiobook. And for three lucky individuals, your name or the name of someone you care about mentioned prior to the Audiobook reading.

The recording studio would be first priority with mastering the second priority. story:
If you decided to join me on this journey and desire to support me; feel free to share this campaign with your friends; family and colleagues. Tag me in your post and use the htag #Buildingnetworks #Makeithappen 

Story of My Book

Today's Superpower: Building Networks is a book that will highlight a set of mindset principles that will enable you to create, join, and leverage the power of networks to innovate and change society.

My name is Mikel Mangold, and I am the author of Today's Superpower: Building Networks. I wrote this book because of several things our society is currently facing: speed of change, the decline of corporate innovation, the decline in employees engagement & motivation, and the rise of agile, dynamic, innovative startups which are challenging the way we do things.

Data shows:

  • According to a 2016 report by Innosight, corporations in the S&P 500 Index in 1965 stayed in the index for an average was of 33 years. By 1990, the average was about 20 years and is now forecast to shrink to 14 years by 2026. (1) 
  • According to a Deloitte US study, made in 2017, only 13% are passionate and engaged at work. (2) 
  • A monumental 1998 study, named Global Theory of Intellectual Change, analyzed the network of philosophers and mathematicians for over two thousand years in both Asian and Western societies. The study showed the innovator's or philosopher's network (their connection with others) was the secret behind the individual’s exceptional creativity. The ability to tap into a social capital to gather ideas is crucial to innovation, but most organizations work in isolation. (3) 
  • 79% of employees are leaving their jobs, because their performance has not been recognized. 74% don't feel that they're allowed to challenge something in the meeting. (https://www.ferrazzigreenlight.com/)
  • During the COVID-19 pandemic; a study in the UK surveyed 2,000 16 to 25-year-olds and showed that more than half (57%) of young people is ‘scared’ about being unemployed, and that 43% are worried that they will never be able to get a job. (4-5)
Companies continue to work in hierarchies and avoid moving outside their own silos when this is exactly what's needed to adapt to the speed of transformation. We need to be connected to others (teams or other companies). This is more important today than it has ever been.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that today's world offers us an incredible opportunity: with available online platforms and today's political and corporate landscape, everyone is able to create networks, including you. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for entrepreneurship and waking up with meaning to make this world a better place. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you focus on collaborating instead of trying to do it alone. Solving big problems can be hard, and I don't want you to give up.

In this book, you'll learn about the mindset and principles to adopt to form networks. You'll hear stories such as...
  • How Naveen Jain, a billionaire I met in the Silicon Valley created his own network and success by being bold, challenging the status quo, and adopting a moonshot mindset
  • How Gregg Stuar, a UK-based corporate innovator, failed at first and how he pivoted to succeed at launching a new business for his company using the power of networks (bringing a lot of people in to shape the idea).
  • My own stories and the experiences I had in Silicon Valley. There I discovered what they are doing that the rest of the world is not doing. They succeed as a network; they work "for Silicon Valley" and not for their own company.
  • How a Silicon Valley Venture Capitalist (VC), who mentored me in 2020, build relationships. In the book, I'll share the core principle she uses everyday to create business outcomes.

Today’s Superpower: Building Networks is a nonfiction book that speaks to wantrepreneurs (the ones wanting to become entrepreneurs or adopting an entrepreneurial mindset), and mid-career professionals - looking for a career change - who want to look at innovation and change management in a new way.

You will love this book if you are a dreamer, if you want to have an impact in the world, and you want to learn how to build networks around you so people join your mission (inside or outside an organization).

Source: 

  1. https://www.brightonandhoveindependent.co.uk/ne...
  2. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/deloit...
  3. Collins, R. (1998). A global theory of intellectual change. Harvard University. 
  4. https://www.aei.org/carpe-diem/fortune-500-firm...
  5. https://www.aei.org/carpe-diem/fortune-500-firm...

The Book - Today's Superpower: Building Networks

THE BOOK IS DIVIDED INTO THREE PARTS:

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3. This first part is about explaining how we got here; why do we follow timeline and processes? Why do we follow rules? This part is also about explaining how Silicon Valley operates differently: what I have seen and experienced, and what they are doing right.

Part 2 contains chapters 4-10. Here you will learn about principles I have detected from successful individuals who created a network around them to drive positive change. All chapters are driven by primary, secondary, and personal stories. In one of the chapters, you will learn how Alice Bosley and Patricia Letayf, co-founders of 51labs, build their resilience in Iraq through their network, how they’ve saved their incubator from closing its doors.

Part 3 contains chapters 11-12. This part is about the closing words and my hope for this book; including the importance of moving outside our silos; getting interdisciplinary exposure and being exposed to diverse minds. I’ll highlight a set of technological and social trends we are starting to see and will continue to accelerate in the coming years.

What I Need & What You'll Get

  • This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, eBook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter 2021!
  • I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the eBook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

Above the Tier 3: 50% of the profits will go to JA Worldwide or Hult Prize Foundation (to be decided).

About the Author

Mikel Mangold is a French-German, Germany-based corporate innovator, building ventures and forming partnerships for the Venture Lab at NGK SPARK PLUG CO., LTD. He previously worked for Bayer G4A (Digital Health Start-Up Accelerator) and the Bayer CoLaborator (Biotech Start-Up Incubator) in San Francisco. He is the co-author of the academic paper: What Corporates Can Do to Help an Innovation Ecosystem Thrive -- and Why They Should Do It, co-host of The Ecosystem Show, advisor, and mentor. Mikel creates positive change through networks. A chemist by training, a traveler (>30 countries) / global citizen, and an exponential thinker.

Mikel studied chemistry for six and a half years. During this time, he realized that, while science makes almost anything possible, on its own science isn't enough. There are factors that limit what science can accomplish, such as money, politics, mindset, and lack of collaboration.
Technological and other advances are inhibited by the conservative mindset still held by many. This results in an inability to deal effectively with the uncertainty and ambiguity of the modern era.

Mikel's mission is to change this mindset by being a champion for collaboration and networking—to own today's superpower.

For more information, you can connect with Mikel Mangold at mikel.mangold@gmail.com and on social media (see below)

LinkedIn: [Mikel Mangold], 
Instagram - [@mikelmangold] 
Facebook - [Mikel Mangold] 
Twitter - [@mikelmangold_]


 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:
  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g., 1 or 2 paperbacks
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
  • Use >> this form << , share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up to date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit?)

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #BuildingNetworks and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!
Tag:
LinkedIn: [Mikel Mangold], / @NewDegreePress
Instragram - [@mikelmangold] / @newdegreepress
Facebook - [Mikel Mangold] / @NewDegreePress
Twitter - [@mikelmangold_] / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Mikel Mangold

story:
A good magic system draws your audience in, augments the plot, and amplifies important aspects of your story. An incomplete or poorly implemented magic system can have the opposite effect, driving readers away and potentially damaging critical story elements.

This can be intimidating and frustrating because building a magic system and deftly weaving it into a story is hard. It’s a process that’s easy to start but difficult to master and is currently treated as a mystical art.

It doesn’t have to be that way.

Welcome to The Magic System Blueprint: an eBook and magic-building tool designed to quickly give you a holistic understanding of any magic system. It will help you crack open a system, show you the moving parts, and help you identify what makes one system different from another.

With the Blueprint in hand, we can take a more structured and deliberate approach to building magic systems. This allows us to home in on the most important factors of any magic system, allowing us to build better, more complete magic systems in less time. Once you see how it works, you can build or analyze any magic system imaginable.

In short: building magic systems is about to get a whole lot easier!

 

A Heart-Felt Thanks

Honestly, I'm thankful that you're here reading this right now. I am extremely grateful for your time and backing for just a single dollar means so much to me.

Listed in the Acknowledgements

If you backed this project for $5 or more, you've helped raise this book to the next level, and that deserves acknowledgment. With this perk, you will be listed in the front section of the book however you choose (name, pen-name, Twitter handle, discord user name, email, etc).

Book Formats: PDF / Paperback / Hardback

This part is pretty straightforward. Physical copies can only be shipped to addresses in the United States and Canada. The hardback edition is currently limited to this campaign as I have no plans to print more in the future. If having a hardback copy matters to you, this may be your only chance.

Bonus Blueprints

The Magic System Blueprint allows you to take a snapshot of the most important attributes of a magic system from a specific point of view and time. By changing this perspective, we can explore a magic system from different angles to turn it into a 3-dimensional, fully realized system.

In the book, we examine the magic of Allomancy from the Mistborn trilogy, the tech from Stargate SG-1, the magic from The Lord of the Rings, and the powers from the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

These bonus blueprints look at each of these systems from new perspectives

  • Allomancy: mapped from the Skaa (slave caste) perspective
  • Stargate SG-1: mapped from the Goa'uld (antagonist) perspective
  • Lord of the Rings; mapped from Sauron's (antagonist) perspective
  • Marvel Cinematic Universe: mapped from later in the MCU timeline 

Types of Magic Cheat-Sheet

There's more to the types of magic than just Hard and Soft spectrum. This digital handout serves as a quick reference to explain the different types of magic systems as well as their pros and cons.

Coaching with C. R. Rowenson

If there's anything I love as much as magic systems, it's helping people. I've been coaching writers for years now to help them shore up their magic systems, fix plot problems, and generally smooth out the writing process. If you're stuck with you're writing, I'm here to help. 

My coaching usually runs between $75-$125 per hour. As part of the Master Magic-Builder tier, you get one hour of coaching absolutely free. If you'd like to know more about it, you can always check out the information here.

 

The end of the campaign is rapidly approaching, but the opportunities are far from over. The newest one being the Magic System Blueprint Referral Contest!

The rules are simple: using the Indiegogo sharing links, see how much support you can bring in for the campaign. As the contributions from your friends, family, and other referrals pass certain thresholds, you will receive additional rewards.

To get credit for all your referrals, be sure you're logged into your Indiegogo account and use the Indiegogo social media sharing buttons. You can find more details on referrals and being part of a referral contest here.

Referral Rewards

The first tier may seem a little strange, but I know not everyone can afford to back the campaign and wanted them to still have a chance to get the book. All referral contest rewards will be delivered in November at the same time as normal backer rewards.

Additional Rewards May Unlock as Referrals Arrive

 

With each goal reached, I'll use the Magic System Blueprint to map out five more popular magic systems.

These bonus blueprints will be added to the Arcane Adept tier and both Master Magic-Builder tiers. They will also be available to purchase as addons for all other tiers.

 

You might be wondering why this book needs a crowdfunding campaign. It’s already written and will be coming out later in 2021 one way or another. So what’s the point of all this?

Well, publishing a book is expensive. I’m running this campaign to help defray some of these expenses. The funds from this campaign will go directly toward editing, publishing, and advertising for this book to help it reach as many people as possible. 

Here’s the breakdown of costs for publishing a book:

  • Line Edit - $1,000
  • Proofreading - $500
  • Book Cover & Images - $300
  • Interior Design - $500
  • eBook Design - $500
  • ISBN - $300 
  • Copyright and Trademark - $315
  • Indiegogo Platform fee of 5%
  • Transaction fee of 2.9%

Total: $3,685

My Target: $2,700

I’m doing everything I can to minimize expenses without cutting out important steps and/or decreasing the quality of the book. This mostly comes down to bartering, making promotional agreements, and an exchange of my services for someone else's.

In the end, I think I can bring this as low as $2,700 in expenses.

 

The name’s C. R. Rowenson. Trained in the dark and mysterious arts of chemistry and chemical engineering, I spend my time blowing things up and spreading chaos. Fortunately for everyone, it’s mostly in my head… mostly.

Over the years I have developed a passion for writing, but I have an even deeper love for magic systems. I love reading them, I love designing them, and I love writing them. If there’s a magic system in a book, game, comic, show, or movie, I am far more likely to give it a go.

I. Love. Magic.

Beyond that, I’m a huge tabletop RPG nut, I’ve trained for a long time in martial arts, and I can’t seem to get enough of Skyrim. I just started a character in Skyrim VR and am having a blast. If you want to get bored quickly, just ask me about my current character and the mods I have installed for his playthrough.

 

Every shred of support makes a difference, and not just for me but for everyone involved along the way.

I plan on taking every cent made in this campaign and pouring it back into the book. Getting more backing here means I can pay the artists, editors, marketing specialists, and book designers what their expertise is truly worth. Not only that but the more backing we get here, the better the final product and the more people will be exposed to the book.

And The Magic System Blueprint is a game changer!

Magic-building for most people is an unstructured, nebulous thing you practice until it “feels right”. The entire process is based on instinct and hunches. The Blueprint changes that, making the process into something tangible and structured.

At the end of the day, I want to see more and better magic systems in our stories. They don’t have to be my magic systems. I don’t want them to be all my magic systems. There are so many storytellers out there that just need a little more structure to bring their marvelous magic system to life.

Let’s make that happen!

 

As part of the development and editing of this book, I was fortunate enough to have several test readers that helped find and eliminate confusing, misleading, or erroneous parts of the text. These are what some of them had to say about The Magic System Blueprint.

 

"From the onset, the Magic System Blueprint proved to be a much easier system than I had originally thought. C.R. Rowenson's worksheet proved invaluable, and he explained each individual attribute on the sheet with clarity. I appreciated the conversational tone of the book, as it made everything more accessible, and kept my interest in a way that a dry, academic textbook never could have. 

The Magic System Blueprint is a must-have for the toolbox of any game creator, fiction writer, or worldbuilder, be they professional or hobbyist. I have added it to my list of recommended reading for all of my professional clients, and anticipate going back to it many times for my own projects in the future."

~ Ian Woodworth, Senior Editor at Big Small Town Books and
Co-Host of the Undercommon Taste Podcast

 

"The Magic System Blueprint is a tool designed to give creators that clarity from multiple perspectives. C. R. Rowenson took this diversified, complicated topic, distilled it to its essence, and found a way to communicate that in a clear and concise way. Moreover, he even sprinkled some of his unique humor on the top to make the subject more palatable.

Reading and rereading this book made me more and more confident I can enrich my stories with wondrous magic that doesn't bring huge plot holes and awkward Deus Ex Machina moments into them.

This book isn't essential to every writer, gamemaster, and game developer who wants to add magic and/or "sufficiently advanced technology" to their stories. Only to those who want to do it right."

~ Lionel Sondy, Founder of the SONDYVERSE Edutainment Project

 

"I picked up C. R. Rowenson’s book in the hope that I’d be able to understand and create a magical system for my story. Prior to reading the book, I worried that everything would be over my head and complicated and that I would not understand or be able to create a system on my own. The book quickly dispelled those fears. 

Everything was well explained with easy-to-follow examples and the author’s sense of humor made the book fun to read. The book exceeded my expectations. The book opened my eyes to issues and aspects of a magic system I never could have conceived on my own. After reading the book, and completing the included worksheets, I have a working magic system that will enhance my writing. 

I highly recommend C. R. Rowenson’s book if you really want to understand and implement a magical system for your writing."

~ Helen Stavropoulos, Pre-Published Author

 

Want to see the Blueprint in action? Check out these podcast episodes, youtube videos, and recordings.

Exolore Podcast

S2E04: Building Magic Systems with C. R. Rowenson

S2E06: Building Magic Systems Part 2

 

Undercommon Taste Podcast

Episode 48: The Magic System Blueprint - An Interview with C. R. Rowenson

 

The Juno Worldbuilding Project

JUNO - It's a Magical Place!

 

Dead Robot's Society Podcast

Magic Systems for Writers/GMs with C. R. Rowenson

 

Worldbuild With Us Podcast

Exploring The Magic System Blueprint with C. R. Rowenson Pt 1

Exploring The Magic System Blueprint with C. R. Rowenson Pt 2

 

You can also learn more about magic systems and my approach to teaching on my Youtube channel: TheMagicEngineer.

 

Financial Risk: NONE

The book is written and will be published no matter what. This campaign is a way for you to get a great deal on the book, help me defray the cost of publishing, and gain access to exclusive rewards.

That’s part of the reason I chose to go with a Flexible Funding campaign over a Fixed Funding campaign. By going with flexible funding, I can guarantee that you will get the perks you pay for.

Shipping Risks: Minimal

When it comes to sending physical goods across the world, it can get complicated fast. I will do everything I can to get your rewards to you on time.

Fortunately, Indiegogo has many tools and connections to make this process as easy and streamlined as possible. Regardless of what happens, I will keep you up to date and informed as events unfold

Scheduling Risks: Minimal

Some of the prizes require getting events worked into our busy schedules. Depending on the perk in question and the number of people that claim it, it might take some time to make certain things happen.

In the case of webinars or Q&As, you might not be able to attend the live event. In such a case, I will make sure you get a copy of the recording so you don’t miss anything important.

 

Spread the word!

Email your favorite authors. tell the other people in your writing group. Rant about it to your family. Bore strangers you just met at that party you didn’t really want to go to in the first place. 

If they’ve got a pulse, tell them about it... Actually, tell them even if they don’t have a pulse! There will be no prejudice against the undead in this campaign.

To make things easier for you, I've put together a press kit with a variety of images optimized for different social media platforms. You can find them all here.

Be Helpful in the Comments

Start conversations, meet new people, and generally engage. Even if you don’t come away from this with a copy of the book, maybe you can leave with a new friend or two.

A good magic system draws your audience in, augments the plot, and amplifies important aspects of your story. An incomplete or poorly implemented magic system can have the opposite effect, driving readers away and potentially damaging critical story elements.
This can be intimidating and frustrating because building a magic system and deftly weaving it into a story is hard. It’s a process that’s easy to start but difficult to master and is currently treated as a mystical art.
It doesn’t have to be that way.
Welcome to The Magic System Blueprint: an eBook and magic-building tool designed to quickly give you a holistic understanding of any magic system. It will help you crack open a system, show you the moving parts, and help you identify what makes one system different from another.
With the Blueprint in hand, we can take a more structured and deliberate approach to building magic systems. This allows us to home in on the most important factors of any magic system, allowing us to build better, more complete magic systems in less time. Once you see how it works, you can build or analyze any magic system imaginable.
In short: building magic systems is about to get a whole lot easier!

story:
Short Summary

Tribe of Men: Understanding How to Evolve Your Masculinity, Find Your Community and Reach Your Potential is about overcoming toxic masculine thoughts and actions by using your strengths to lay the foundations for success. Ultimately, finding your purpose, planning your happiness, and building your resilience muscle.

My name is Michael King Jr., and I am the author of Tribe of Men. I wrote this book to show that in order to find emotional peace, and to maintain a proper work/life balance, Men's mental health matters! I want to help men be relationship ready before they get into commitments, whether social, intimate, or business. I want to show how to heal communities by addressing issues faced by everyday men.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the importance of self care for body, mind, and spirit; to discover the value of mental health. I will show you how to make a plan to become a better king for your kingdom. This book is an opportunity for you to engage with the evolution of cultural norms, escape from patriarchal traditions, and discover a path to your purpose.

You will love this book if you are ready to tackle tough issues in your life! Whether that be bouncing back from a break up or even just stressful life transitions.

Tribe of Men speaks to busy millennials and generation X men who want to grapple with self development and cultural practices in a new way. Ultimately, I hope that Tribe of Men inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pushing you to engage with questions like:
What tools do I need to build my resilience muscle?
How do you deal with issues of insecurity?
How do you create healthy relationships?
Can you confront toxic masculine pride?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the power of vulnerability, cultural trauma, and the stigma surrounding mental health will change us all for the better.

The Book - Tribe of Men

The book begins by covering how we got to the point where we are. Next, I show the situations that these issues have lead to. Finally, I close out the book by showing the strategies and mindsets needed to fix the problems we see.

Throughout the book I address issues such as the cult of toxic masculinity, the science behind a growth mindset, and men’s mental health. I hope to express the importance of having conversations relating to these issues and their time sensitive nature.

These issues need to be taken seriously now and not pushed off on the future generation. I hope to challenge traditional views of patriarchy. These traditions appear in our everyday lives and can be a major hinderance to true change. I hope to show that we can use our faith to help administer change and adapt to the ever changing pressures of modern life.

The book will also look at how, at times, traditions limit true change. In my book, I share the story of a family that lost business due to gender bias. This plumbing business lost revenue because instead of giving the business minded women leadership of the company, power was given to the eldest male. They were not prepared for the role. Through the use of these stories I hope to highlight the challenges men face in finding purpose in life and building sound stable relationships.

I conclude the book by showing how, through the creation of Tribes, we can build a support structure that helps us to address and overcome many of the negative effects of toxic masculinity. Creating a Tribe in our professional lives. What to do as leaders in the workplace, colleagues with women, and becoming agents of change. Creating a Tribe in our personal lives. How to build and maintain male friendships, community involvement, and spiritual development. And lastly, creating a Tribe in our family lives. How to parent young boys. As well as fostering a loving relationship with your wife.

The problems discussed early in the book begin in childhood and continue throughout life. I will show why it is important to talk to parents, spouses, young professionals. If you have felt the pain of toxic masculinity, you know that this is a fight we must take on now. The issues faced today will fester and continue to grow with time. In order to save future generations the pain and heartbreak of dealing with toxic masculinity we must be strong now. We need to have these conversations now. These are issues that are important to discuss with parents, spouses, and young professionals. If you have felt the pain of toxic masculinity then you know it is time to fight this battle in the hopes that we can spare the younger generation from experiencing that same pain.

What I Need & What You'll Get
I need your support via time, talent and/or treasure. Over the next 30 days I’ll be posting updates about the book, take some time to like, comment and share the posts. There are opportunities to use your talents by being part of my beta reader community providing feedback that will help me fine tune chapters. Your treasure goes to supporting the book publishing milestone.

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.

You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!


About the Author

Michael King Jr. is a licensed clinical social worker, men's mental health therapist, a first generation Caribbean-American, as well as Mikey and Esther's oldest son! He wrote this book to scratch the number one goal off of his bucket list. Mike is passionate about the Black community. He wants men to connect with the desires that God has placed in their hearts. When he was at his lowest, he didn't even know it. The hardest part of his journey was taking that first step. This book seeks to highlight the path along this journey in the hopes that it will open up a space for men to boldly and courageously discuss what healthy masculinity looks like.

When Mike is not writing, he likes to ride his mountain bike, go on hikes, and look at mural paintings. Mike is also a USATF level 1 track and field coach and enjoys volunteering his services with the Full Speed Athletics youth track club. A Caribbean music lover, a steelpan player, and a brother of the Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity. He is the proud father of Lailah and Charles and the brother of Stephen.

For more information, you can connect with Michael King by email at MikeKingtheWriter@gmail.com and on Instagram @therapist_mikeking tweet him @Therapist_MikeK

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TribeofMen and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Michael King Jr

Short SummaryTribe of Men: Understanding How to Evolve Your Masculinity, Find Your Community and Reach Your Potential is about overcoming toxic masculine thoughts and actions by using your strengths to lay the foundations for success. Ultimately, finding your purpose, planning your happiness, and building your resilience muscle.My name is Michael King Jr., and I am the author of Tribe of Men. I wrote this book to show that in order to find emotional peace, and to maintain a proper work/life balance, Men's mental health matters! I want to help men be relationship ready before they get into commitments, whether social, intimate, or business. I want to show how to heal communities by addressing issues faced by everyday men.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the importance of self care for body, mind, and spirit; to discover the value of mental health. I will show you how to make a plan to become a better king for your kingdom. This book is an opportunity for you to engage with the evolution of cultural norms, escape from patriarchal traditions, and discover a path to your purpose.You will love this book if you are ready to tackle tough issues in your life! Whether that be bouncing back from a break up or even just stressful life transitions.Tribe of Men speaks to busy millennials and generation X men who want to grapple with self development and cultural practices in a new way. Ultimately, I hope that Tribe of Men inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pushing you to engage with questions like:What tools do I need to build my resilience muscle?How do you deal with issues of insecurity?How do you create healthy relationships?Can you confront toxic masculine pride?I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the power of vulnerability, cultural trauma, and the stigma surrounding mental health will change us all for the better.The Book - Tribe of MenThe book begins by covering how we got to the point where we are. Next, I show the situations that these issues have lead to. Finally, I close out the book by showing the strategies and mindsets needed to fix the problems we see.Throughout the book I address issues such as the cult of toxic masculinity, the science behind a growth mindset, and men’s mental health. I hope to express the importance of having conversations relating to these issues and their time sensitive nature.These issues need to be taken seriously now and not pushed off on the future generation. I hope to challenge traditional views of patriarchy. These traditions appear in our everyday lives and can be a major hinderance to true change. I hope to show that we can use our faith to help administer change and adapt to the ever changing pressures of modern life.The book will also look at how, at times, traditions limit true change. In my book, I share the story of a family that lost business due to gender bias. This plumbing business lost revenue because instead of giving the business minded women leadership of the company, power was given to the eldest male. They were not prepared for the role. Through the use of these stories I hope to highlight the challenges men face in finding purpose in life and building sound stable relationships.I conclude the book by showing how, through the creation of Tribes, we can build a support structure that helps us to address and overcome many of the negative effects of toxic masculinity. Creating a Tribe in our professional lives. What to do as leaders in the workplace, colleagues with women, and becoming agents of change. Creating a Tribe in our personal lives. How to build and maintain male friendships, community involvement, and spiritual development. And lastly, creating a Tribe in our family lives. How to parent young boys. As well as fostering a loving relationship with your wife.The problems discussed early in the book begin in childhood and continue throughout life. I will show why it is important to talk to parents, spouses, young professionals. If you have felt the pain of toxic masculinity, you know that this is a fight we must take on now. The issues faced today will fester and continue to grow with time. In order to save future generations the pain and heartbreak of dealing with toxic masculinity we must be strong now. We need to have these conversations now. These are issues that are important to discuss with parents, spouses, and young professionals. If you have felt the pain of toxic masculinity then you know it is time to fight this battle in the hopes that we can spare the younger generation from experiencing that same pain.What I Need & What You'll GetI need your support via time, talent and/or treasure. Over the next 30 days I’ll be posting updates about the book, take some time to like, comment and share the posts. There are opportunities to use your talents by being part of my beta reader community providing feedback that will help me fine tune chapters. Your treasure goes to supporting the book publishing milestone.This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.
When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
And much more!

He wrote this book to scratch the number one goal off of his bucket list. Mike is passionate about the Black community. He wants men to connect with the desires that God has placed in their hearts. When he was at his lowest, he didn't even know it. The hardest part of his journey was taking that first step. This book seeks to highlight the path along this journey in the hopes that it will open up a space for men to boldly and courageously discuss what healthy masculinity looks like.When Mike is not writing, he likes to ride his mountain bike, go on hikes, and look at mural paintings. Mike is also a USATF level 1 track and field coach and enjoys volunteering his services with the Full Speed Athletics youth track club. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TribeofMen and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Michael King Jr

story:
What is it?

In the last few years I've raised a lot of money for projects. Whether it be the Great War Group, or child victims of domestic violence, I've hit you all up at some stage for someone else's gain. It feels very odd asking for something for me, for a change, but for the last few months I have been working my tail off with my wonderful illustrator chum Steve Smith to produce something completely new. We wanted, using my brain and his arty fingers to produce a one volume history of the First World War for young people. Not only would we teach them about the Western Front and trenches, but we'd explain why it happened, and how it was a truly global conflict with far-reaching consequences.

Why Do We Need Funding?

We are utterly in love with the result, and our proof-readers are too. But it's become a monster. We envisaged 200 pages, but then things like Africa, the Caucasus Front, the Russian Revolution would have had to be cut. We would have lost the chance to fulfil our remit of talking about all victims of the war and all contributors. The book now comes in at nearly 400 pages. At all junctions Steve and I have tried to produce the war book we wish we'd owned as nerdy kids. A weird thing happened, too, in the process. It has turned out to be ideal as a primer for adult newcomers to the subject. We passionately believe in publishing the book as it is now, and not hacking it to pieces. 

What Will My Funding Do?

Well you'll see from the perks, that not only will you bag your own copy, but we've set this funding project up so that you can also help us get it into schools by donating copies to children. 

  • It is imperative that we shift the narrative of the First World War away from being solely about trenches and the Western Front. And we need to start somewhere.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Tiffany Green-Abdullah and I am the author of The Bean Pie: 4 Generations of Faith, Family, and Fortitude. I wrote this book as a way to connect with my past, remind me of how far I have come and where I came from. This is a guide from my past to my future. It is a legacy for my children and family. Making bean pies connected me to my past and created a curiosity that has lead me as it does today.

This book is a tribute to the voiceless women in my family who endured pain and sacrifice beyond comprehension so that our family can exist as it does today. My role is to write this so that we can uplift them and honor their commitment and sacrifice into a hopeful future. I want my children and future generations to know that they are not here by accident. The toil of our ancestors, including the success and mistakes make us who we are. No one is perfect, but it takes strength and fortitude to keep going and learn from one generation to the next. I am leaning on that strength myself as I write this book during one of the most challenging times the world has seen.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover an unknown story about the bean pie and my family’s history in the Nation of Islam. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand the internal pain that these women endured in breaking cycles for our future.

In this book, you'll learn about Faith, Forgiveness and Fortitude, including:

  • How my mother, at age 14, helped to spread the bean pie from Chicago to all over the nation
  • How Aunt Daisy migrated from Alabama to Detroit and then to Chicago and became a mogul.
  • How faith, family and fortitude helped me overcome the death of two of my children.

You will love this book if you want to learn about unsung heroes behind history and how families need to share their stories.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copy editing for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this December 2020.
  • When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Tiffany Green-Abdullah, is a visionary leader in learning technologies, design education as well as community development. She was the first recipient of the Masters of Education in Education and Technology from Peabody School of Education at Vanderbilt University. As a first-generation student from Chicago IL, she received a Bachelor of Science in Economics also from Vanderbilt University. Tiffany has been an entrepreneur since age 1994.  She has led a consulting firm under her name since 2008 to develop strategic alliances in emerging and disruptive industries, provide strategy and development in attracting and retaining diverse talent globally, and an incubator for new business, economic and community models.

Tiffany is the Chief Operations Officer of Tarchitects LLC, her family’s architecture and construction firm. She and her architect husband, Tariq Abdullah are co-founders of the Tarchitects Foundation for Architecture and Design which propels young designers. Their largest program is The Community Academy for Architecture and Design, the first elementary school for architecture and design in the nation. She lives in Atlanta with her husband and 3 children. 

To contact Tiffany, connect with her at author@thebeanpie.com and thebeanpie.com
Instagram: thebeanpiebook
 

The Impact

Your contribution is about more than money. It sends a message to me and to the world that we need more voices, especially Black women writers and Black family stories. 

I hope that you are here because you care about this project and how it might inspire someone. I hope you know I have a track record of success in my career, in my community and this book is the next step for me. I plan to speak at schools, book clubs, and any organization with an interest.

It is not easy to share so many personal stories with the world, but I hope by doing so, I can impact someone who is not sure how they are going to make it through a difficult period. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes it. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #thebeanpiebook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Tiffany Green-Abdullah
