story:
Our Story

Hi! My name is Jennifer Juvenelle and I'd like to share my story with you. This novel is more than four years in the making, and it's my greatest accomplishment to date. I began writing in the summer of 2016 without knowing or understanding how the life and tribulations of Sophie Greer would shape my life. Now, after all the writing (and rewriting) I'm ready to share the life-altering and sometimes shattering, tale of Sophie Greer in this epic first book of what will become the Daughter of Belial series. 

Given the expanding nature of the publishing industry, I've decided to self-publish, and now that my book is ready to launch, I plan to ensure it succeeds. This is why I'm running this campaign. Your generous contribution will play a vital role in helping Daughter of Belial reach a bigger audience. To do that, I must hire a professional editor, book designer, book marketer, as well as a distribution company, and run ads prior to and during the launch.

With your support and a lot of hard work, I'm confident this book will make self-publishing history!

Why am I so confident? Because I believe in the story. 

Here's a quick blurb to let you in on the action: 

Sophie Greer, a young consultant for a major mergers and acquisitions firm, wakes up hungover and dumped thinking her worst problem is catching her boyfriend cheating the day before. But things soon go from bad to worse when she's pulled into a complex family drama involving her billionaire boss, Edward Hughes, and his brutish half-brother, Wyatt McGregor. Betrayed by the man who raised her, and mysteriously targeted by the illustrious Hughes family, dark revelations propel Sophie down a wormhole so sinister and vast she may never find her way out.

Will she discover her true power and save herself, or be crushed beneath the weight of the all-powerful secret Order of Belial? One thing is certain—family history can be deadly.

 

Looking for reader feedback? One peer reviewer had this to say: 

"In this, her debut novel, Jennifer writes so extraordinarily and exceptionally well, you will surely be taken on a wildly fascinating, and simultaneously horrifying thrill ride. Fasten your seat belt – once you go down this rabbit hole, you will not come back the same. This book is a truly captivating, provocative read."

Want more? The most common comparisons from early reader responses that I've received for my writing have been to Gillian Flynn (Gone Girl) and Dan Brown (The Da Vinci Code). I'm humbled by their replies and while this story is definitely its own original saga, I'd be honored to stand amongst those bestselling behemoths. 

 

What's Needed & What You'll Receive

Let's get to the nitty-gritty of what I need to have a successful book launch, and exactly what you'll receive when you contribute. 

Every dollar you give will go to the following:

  • Copy editor & proofreader to fine-tune the final manuscript before it goes to print
  • Interior book designer to format the interiors of the ebook & print editions
  • Graphic designer to finalize the front cover and create beautiful advertisements
  • ISBN numbers & fees for official registration to sell the book
  • Distribution company to print hard & softcover copies of the novel
  • Marketing for the book (hire a marketer, advertising, advanced reader copies (ARCs) for reviewers, etc.)

 

What you receive when you donate:

I've lined up a lot of amazing perks at different price levels. Below is a brief highlight of some of the features. For more details, check out the full list of perks to the right ———>->->

  • Bound Early Draft of Manuscript w/ Handwritten Edits & Annotations, dedicated to you and signed by me, the author
  • Private & Group Q&A's with me after the book launch
  • Your name in the Acknowledgments section of the book
  • Signed Hardcover First Editions & Paperbacks
  • Limited Edition Daughter of Belial Postcards
  • Autographed Framed Poster of Book Cover
  • eBook & Personal Thank You's

 

Why Your Contribution Matters

Breaking into the traditional publishing world is like trying to get into a secure military facility on wits and charm alone. The gatekeepers don't take kindly to a brazen newbie who doesn't play by their rules. The ability for an author to self-publish their work gives the power back to the writer, and ultimately, to everyday people like you and me. 

This story is not just the tale of a charming young woman who gets kidnapped. It's a rabbit hole that puts you, the reader, smack in the middle of the main character's shoes. You will become Sophie Greer. What does it feel like when everyone around you seems to know you better than you know yourself? You will find out. What exactly is the global elite really up to during their secret society rituals? You will find out. And the answers will churn your stomach. 

My book, Daughter of Belial, is not just a suspenseful and entertaining read. It's provocative and triggering. I've always found universal truths in fictional stories make the best reads, and Daughter of Belial is a shining example of that.

With the current mayhem reigning in the world, Sophie Greer's story needs to be told. Because it's not just her story. It's ours. 

 

Risks & Challenges

There are risks associated with any innovative endeavor. Publishing a book without the might of the major publishing houses behind you may be a challenge, but can it be done to great success? Yes! 

Having an amazing story is crucial. But after that, what makes someone decide to buy a book? The front cover imagery and back jacket blurb are vital elements to enticing readers to take a chance on a new story.

With those elements and an excellent marketing strategy, Daughter of Belial has the potential to soar to incredible heights. But I can't do it alone. Your contribution will directly impact my ability to hire a fantastic editor and put a strong marketing team in place. 

Regardless of whether I hit my intended goal, every dollar raised will go towards the successful launch of this book, and no matter what, it will be released in June 2021!

 

Love The Book But Can't Spare the Bucks? 

That's okay! There are other ways to help than through monetary contributions. Your support is valuable and appreciated at every level.

You can help by spreading the word about this Indiegogo campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get people excited on social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Twitter! Wherever you have a social media presence, you can share the link to this campaign.

Not on social media? You can also help spread the word by sharing the Iink to my campaign with friends and family via email and text. 

Your support and care mean the world to me. Thank you!
story_txt:
Our Story
Hi! My name is Jennifer Juvenelle and I'd like to share my story with you. This novel is more than four years in the making, and it's my greatest accomplishment to date. I began writing in the summer of 2016 without knowing or understanding how the life and tribulations of Sophie Greer would shape my life. Now, after all the writing (and rewriting) I'm ready to share the life-altering and sometimes shattering, tale of Sophie Greer in this epic first book of what will become the Daughter of Belial series. 
Given the expanding nature of the publishing industry, I've decided to self-publish, and now that my book is ready to launch, I plan to ensure it succeeds. This is why I'm running this campaign. Your generous contribution will play a vital role in helping Daughter of Belial reach a bigger audience. To do that, I must hire a professional editor, book designer, book marketer, as well as a distribution company, and run ads prior to and during the launch.
With your support and a lot of hard work, I'm confident this book will make self-publishing history!
Why am I so confident? Because I believe in the story. 
Here's a quick blurb to let you in on the action: 
Sophie Greer, a young consultant for a major mergers and acquisitions firm, wakes up hungover and dumped thinking her worst problem is catching her boyfriend cheating the day before. But things soon go from bad to worse when she's pulled into a complex family drama involving her billionaire boss, Edward Hughes, and his brutish half-brother, Wyatt McGregor. Betrayed by the man who raised her, and mysteriously targeted by the illustrious Hughes family, dark revelations propel Sophie down a wormhole so sinister and vast she may never find her way out. 
Will she discover her true power and save herself, or be crushed beneath the weight of the all-powerful secret Order of Belial? One thing is certain—family history can be deadly.
 
Looking for reader feedback? One peer reviewer had this to say: 
"In this, her debut novel, Jennifer writes so extraordinarily and exceptionally well, you will surely be taken on a wildly fascinating, and simultaneously horrifying thrill ride. Fasten your seat belt – once you go down this rabbit hole, you will not come back the same. This book is a truly captivating, provocative read."
Want more? The most common comparisons from early reader responses that I've received for my writing have been to Gillian Flynn (Gone Girl) and Dan Brown (The Da Vinci Code). I'm humbled by their replies and while this story is definitely its own original saga, I'd be honored to stand amongst those bestselling behemoths. 
 

What's Needed & What You'll Receive
Let's get to the nitty-gritty of what I need to have a successful book launch, and exactly what you'll receive when you contribute. 
Every dollar you give will go to the following:


Copy editor & proofreader to fine-tune the final manuscript before it goes to print

Interior book designer to format the interiors of the ebook & print editions

Graphic designer to finalize the front cover and create beautiful advertisements

ISBN numbers & fees for official registration to sell the book

Distribution company to print hard & softcover copies of the novel

Marketing for the book (hire a marketer, advertising, advanced reader copies (ARCs) for reviewers, etc.)

 
What you receive when you donate:
I've lined up a lot of amazing perks at different price levels. Below is a brief highlight of some of the features. For more details, check out the full list of perks to the right ———>->->

Bound Early Draft of Manuscript w/ Handwritten Edits & Annotations, dedicated to you and signed by me, the author
Private & Group Q&A's with me after the book launch
Your name in the Acknowledgments section of the book
Signed Hardcover First Editions & Paperbacks
Limited Edition Daughter of Belial Postcards
Autographed Framed Poster of Book Cover
eBook & Personal Thank You's


 
Why Your Contribution Matters
Breaking into the traditional publishing world is like trying to get into a secure military facility on wits and charm alone. The gatekeepers don't take kindly to a brazen newbie who doesn't play by their rules. The ability for an author to self-publish their work gives the power back to the writer, and ultimately, to everyday people like you and me. 
This story is not just the tale of a charming young woman who gets kidnapped. It's a rabbit hole that puts you, the reader, smack in the middle of the main character's shoes. You will become Sophie Greer. What does it feel like when everyone around you seems to know you better than you know yourself? You will find out. What exactly is the global elite really up to during their secret society rituals? You will find out. And the answers will churn your stomach. 
My book, Daughter of Belial, is not just a suspenseful and entertaining read. It's provocative and triggering. I've always found universal truths in fictional stories make the best reads, and Daughter of Belial is a shining example of that.
With the current mayhem reigning in the world, Sophie Greer's story needs to be told. Because it's not just her story. It's ours. 

 
Risks & Challenges
There are risks associated with any innovative endeavor. Publishing a book without the might of the major publishing houses behind you may be a challenge, but can it be done to great success? Yes! 
Having an amazing story is crucial. But after that, what makes someone decide to buy a book? The front cover imagery and back jacket blurb are vital elements to enticing readers to take a chance on a new story.
With those elements and an excellent marketing strategy, Daughter of Belial has the potential to soar to incredible heights. But I can't do it alone. Your contribution will directly impact my ability to hire a fantastic editor and put a strong marketing team in place. 
Regardless of whether I hit my intended goal, every dollar raised will go towards the successful launch of this book, and no matter what, it will be released in June 2021!

Not on social media? You can also help spread the word by sharing the Iink to my campaign with friends and family via email and text. 
Your support and care mean the world to me. Thank you!

Short Summary

The new Triangulation: Habitats anthology of science fiction, fantasy, and horror is within reach. Help us get it across the finish line? 

Triangulation is an annual speculative fiction anthology series produced by Parsec, a Pittsburgh-area collective of speculative fiction writers, artists, and fans. Since 2003, the Triangulation series has published quality science fiction, fantasy, and horror. Our editorial staff is made up of volunteers, authors who believe speculative fiction makes the world a brighter place to live. One hundred percent of our income from all sources is used to cover the costs of publishing the anthology.

Beginning in 2019, Triangulation themes have been environmental in nature. The Dark Skies edition concerned light pollution. The Extinction edition was about the loss of biodiversity. This year’s Habitats edition is focused on sustainable habitation, ecosystems that provide food and shelter for people in ways that minimize resource depletion and waste production.

We’re presenting stories from authors who have been published in Asimov’s, Analog, Clarkesworld, Strange Horizons, Daily Science Fiction, Beneath Ceaseless Skies, Escape Pod, Best of British Fantasy, and Best of British Science Fiction. This year we’re also reprinting the classic 1972 Theodore Sturgeon story “Pruzy’s Pot.”

The Habitats edition will contain ~230 pages of science fiction blended with some fantasy and a dash of horror. We have acquired 23 stories and 11 poems. The stories range from a bite-sized 300 words to a full meal of 5,000.

Our authors have created compelling narratives driven by characters required to make hard choices in settings that push the boundaries of imagination:

  • A man learns where he draws the line when it comes to living sustainably.
  • Time dilation and cold sleep allow a traveler to passively observe humanity for thousands of years.
  • A gardener looks at the bright side of the zombie apocalypse.
  • Interested in sustainable housing? Get yourself a SustainaCrock™!
  • Gregor Samsa’s sister helps her students come to terms with the insects in their roof gardens.
  • Access to the multiverse has solved the real estate shortage. What could possibly go wrong?

Please join us on our journey.

What We Need & What You Get

We need money to pay the cover artist and authors, and all the rest of what comes along with publishing a book (print costs, marketing, promotional materials, and shipping costs for contributor copies).

Everyone on the editorial team is a volunteer. 

You get a book packed with new and original stories and poems.

The editors of the Habitats edition are John Thompson, Diane Turnshek, and Dr. Herb Kauderer.

Issues of Triangulation: Habitats will be available online at Amazon.com and Barnes & Noble in both trade paperback and ebook formats and in Pittsburgh-area independent book shops by August 2021.

The Triangulation anthology series is published by Parsec Ink, the publishing wing of Parsec Inc., a Pittsburgh, PA 501(c)(3) organization with a mission to promote the richness of speculative fiction as literature, art, and music, further general education in the sciences and arts, and support contributions—both scientific and artistic—to society.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Share our pre-sale campaign page with your friends, family, and social media network.
  • We are always looking for new readers and line editors. If you’re interested, contact parsecink.editor@gmail.com
  • Follow the Parsec Ink newsletter for information about upcoming calls for submissions.

Stretch Goal

Any additional money raised goes into the 2022 Triangulation anthology. If we make it to $6000, we will be able to increase next year's author's pay rate.

story:
Story of My Book

Mentor Coaching is a guide to help mentors successfully work with the next generation of leaders. 

My name is Terrice Thomas and I am the author of Mentor Coaching. I wrote this book because I was positively impacted by mentors as a young professional, and I would like to help others positively impact a mentee. To be properly prepared for the workforce, people still need coaching on many skills after college that a mentor can provide. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the importance of mentoring the next generation and how crucial it is for effective leadership. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for mentoring young adults. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you be a more effective mentor while helping young adults gain personal and professional development. 

In this book, you'll learn about effective mentoring techniques and hear best practices across the country from experts in a variety of industries. You'll hear stories such as...

  • Pritika Padhi, HR leader (Mumbai, India) and the origins of “gurus” and other mentor misconceptions.
  • Morgan Malone, Director of Development (Chicago, IL) and the importance of social impact for the next generation.
  • Michael Mosby, football coach and nonprofit leader (Memphis, TN) and how coaches can help their players win on and off the field.

You will love this book if you are a person that is passionate about social impact and want to be apart of giving back to your community. You will also love this book if you work with adolescents and young adults and want to help them successfully transition into adulthood or if you are a professional wanting to learn effective mentoring techniques.

Mentor Coaching is a nonfiction book that speaks to leaders and mentors who want to look at mentoring and young adults in a new way.


The Book - Mentor Coaching

The book is written into 4 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3. Part 1 explores the history of mentoring and its importance for youth and young adults. It also explains why millennials and Gen Z needs mentors just as much as children. “Adulting” is difficult to do alone and research shows that most students are struggling to make major life decisions alone. 

Part 2 contains chapters 4-6. Part 2 provides insights into how to be an effective mentor to young adults. It explores the difference between good mentors and bad mentors and the mentoring vs coaching debate.

Part 3 contains chapters 7-11. Part 3 focuses on personal and professional development of young adults. It gives some of the top skills that business and organizational leaders have listed for success, and how to help mentees gain these skills.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this December.
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

 

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

Terrice Thomas is Founder of Bluff City Resumes & Career Coaching and Chatroom Memphis mentoring program. Thomas is a graduate of Jackson State University (Jackson, MS) where she earned a Bachelor's in Mass Communication. She also has a Master's of Public Administration from Keller School of Management (Oak Brook, IL). Thomas has been working in the nonprofit and government sector in Memphis for over 20 years as a leader, mentor and consultant.

She wrote this book because she is passionate about mentoring and helping the next generation succeed as leaders.  

Mentoring is her passion and she has worked with youth and young adults in ministry and professionally for many years. She is also a mother to an 11-year-old son and has a fur baby pit mix. Besides her passion for helping others, she is also a music and art lover.  

For more information, you can connect with Terrice Thomas at terricethomas@gmail.com, Terrice Thomas, MPA - Agency Manager - Memphis Public Library | LinkedIn or https://twitter.com/MemphisMocha. 


 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Use this form- International orders to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo.


Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

  1. At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you.
  2. Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
  3. When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry! 

Please use #MentorCoaching and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag: 
Instragram - @terricethomas / @newdegreepress
Facebook - Terrice Thomas / @NewDegreePress 
Twitter - @MemphisMocha / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Terrice Thomas
